Tedisamil Proposed Indication
Tedisamil
Proposed Indication

The rapid conversion of recent onset (3 hours - 45 days) atrial fibrillation (AFib) or flutter (AFl) to normal sinus rhythm (NSR)
The rapid conversion of recent onset (3 hours -
45 days) atrial fibrillation (AFib) or flutter (AFl) to
normal sinus rhythm (NSR)

Tedisamil Overview
Tedisamil Overview

 Conversion to NSR is rapid and sustained  Gender-specific dosing  Robust detection of arrhythmias with Holters
